name: OPERATION. VERNACULAR. DECODER RING. MEMORY.
description:
This game was made for Secret Samol 2021 for @angstcaffiene, for the excellent prompt "Figure A pirate content". (It is a fangame for the Partizan season of Friends at the Table, and probably won't make much sense outside of that context.)

This game contains text-based sections which you interact with by clicking links, and pixel art sections which you use arrow keys to navigate. If arrow keys aren't working for a pixel art section, click on it and try again.

If you can't progress in a certain section, try moving to another and coming back to it.

This game was made using Bitsy, Twine, Borksy, Pixsy, and various hacks.
